name: Sea Invaders!
description:
Easy to play sea battle simulator from the makers of Helix Jump & Fire Clash.

YOU CAN BOTH
- Play and chill or practice skills
- Create a huge navy fleet or just have some powerfull battle-ship

UNLOCK AND UPGRADE SHIPS
Collect and upgrade a variety of Battle-Ships with different abilities and unique behavior, make them stronger through different upgrades:
- Canons
- Armor
- Critical strike
- Evasion

CONSTANTLY EVOLVING
Look out for new Updates: new ships, locations, boss-fights, special events and siege of forts.

BECOME THE SEA LEGEND
Shoot ‘em up, all of them! Become the true lord of marine areas.

Easy-to-learn controls with tap/timing gameplay mechanics.
